doc.title: Crawler

value.content: A web crawler is a program, often called a bot or robot, which systematically browses the Web to collect data from webpages. Typically search engines (e.g. Google, Bing, etc.) use crawlers to build indexes.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• Web crawler on Wikipedia
  • Search engine (Glossary)
